CustomField.formula:
/* Using the power of 2 to allow for all possible combinations */ CASE( (IF(RFI_Issue_Date__c > RFP_Issue_Date__c,1,0) + IF(RFI_Issue_Date__c > RFI_Submission_Date__c,2,0) + IF(RFI_Issue_Date__c > RFP_Submission_Date__c,4,0) + IF(RFP_Issue_Date__c > RFP_Submission_Date__c ,8,0) ) ,1,"RFI Issue Date after RFP Issue Date" /*1*/ ,2,"RFI Issue Date after RFI Submission Date" /*2*/ ,3,"RFI Issue Date after RFP Issue and RFI Submission Dates" /*1, 2*/ ,4,"RFI Issue Date after RFP Submission Date" /*4*/ ,5,"RFI Issue Date after RFP Issue and Submission Dates" /*1, 4*/ ,6,"RFI Issue Date after RFI and RFP Submission Dates" /*2, 4*/ ,7,"RFI Issue Date after RFP Issue Date and RFI and RFP Submission Dates" /*1, 2, 4*/ ,8,"RFP Issue Date after RFP Submission Date" /*8*/ ,9,"RFI Issue Date after RFP Issue Date which is after RFP Submission Date" /*1, 8*/ ,10,"RFI Issue Date after RFI Issue Date, RFP Issue Date after RFP Submission Date" /*2, 8*/ ,11,"RFI Issue Date after RFP Issue and RFI Submission Dates, RFP Issue Date after RFP Submission Date" /*1, 2, 8*/ ,12,"RFI and RFP Issue Dates after RFP Submission Date" /*4, 8*/ ,13,"RFI Issue Date after RFP Issue and Submission Dates, RFP Issue Date after RFP Submission Date" /*1, 4, 8*/ ,14,"RFI Issue Date after RFI and RFP Submission Dates, RFP Issue Date after RFP Submission Date" /*2, 4, 8*/ ,15,"RFI Issue Date after RFP Issue and Submission Dates and RFI Submission Date, RFP Issue Date after RFP Submission Date" /*1, 2, 4, 8*/
,"" )
CustomField.label: RFI/RFP Date Issue Reason
